Black resigns, as there is no way to prevent 20 QxN ch winning a piece. [19... K-R1, 19... K-R2 or 19... K-N2 are answered by 20 QxP ch K-N1 21 Q-N7 mate!] If the Knight moves, 20 NxP ch is decisive.
